data.name: Sexy Heroine! Part 3 Demo
data.detailed_description:
PRESENTATION


Enjoy a demo of the (sexy) dungeon crawler SEXY HEROINE 3.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1027900/Sexy_Heroine/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1031260/Sexy_Heroine_Part_2/

CONTROLS


To move characters and the cursor, use the directional buttons on the game pad or the arrow keys on the keyboard.

  • ENTER/SPACE: Confirm, OK, Enter
  • ESC: Cancel, Menu
  • PAGE UP: Previous page
  • PAGE DOWN: Next page

If you're playing with the mouse:

  • LEFT-CLICK: Move characters, Confirm, OK, Enter
  • RIGHT-CLICK: Cancel, Menu


  • ALT+ENTER: Switches between window mode and full-screen mode.
  • ALT+F4: Forcibly exits the game.
  • F12: Forcibly returns to the title screen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains public nudity, bondage, humiliation and consensual sexual content.
